author: Just Jared
title: Grammys 2017: Adele Set to Perform!
text:
Adele is set to perform at the upcoming 2017 Grammy Awards !
The 28-year-old entertainer has performed three previous times on the Grammys stage and on February 12, she will perform for a fourth time.
Adele is nominated for five Grammys this year including for Album Of The Year ( 25 ), Record Of The Year (“Hello”), Song Of The Year (“Hello”), Best Pop Solo Performance (“Hello”) and Best Pop Vocal Album ( 25 ).
If you missed it, find out the four other performers who were already announced for the Grammys!
Tune in on February 12 for the show, hosted by James Corden .
